column4: Latest;Preah Sihanouk province –------  Residents of Prey Nup are struggling with a shortage of water and forced to buy water from water sellers to meet their  needs.------As of November 24
column7: people there are gradually experiencing water shortages.------To deal with it
column8: some residents have been forced to buy water from water sellers in order to drink and wash.------Meanwhile
column9: Prey Nup district administration officials said the problem was due to a privately owned water pump. However
column10: the same official claimed that the Prey Nup district administration is looking into the matter and is looking at possible ways to handle the issue. ------TVFB
